  • Constructor Details

    • Main

      public Main()

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main method of program

      Calls methods to load data file, init all controllers, run server and start handling client commands

      Parameters:
      args - (not used)

    • interactiveMode

      public static void interactiveMode()
      Method to handle server requests

      It checks two possible sourses of requests: admin console and client

      If any error is occurred method prints error message and continues to read data

    • askClient

      private static void askClient() throws IOException
      Method to handle requests from all clients

      It gets list of all available clients and then call handleClientRequest(ClientRequest) method

      Throws:
      IOException - If any I\O error occurred
      ReceivingDataException - If error occurred while receiving data from client

    • askAdmin

      private static void askAdmin() throws IOException
      Method to check if any commands from admin were received

      If console input is ready, command is read using CommandReader

      Then handleAdminRequest(PackedCommand) method is called

      Throws:
      IOException

    • handleAdminRequest

      private static void handleAdminRequest(PackedCommand packedCommand)
      Method to handle commands from admin

      It creates UserCommand object, executes it and print result to console

      Parameters:
      packedCommand - Object which contains all info about command

    • handleClientRequest

      private static void handleClientRequest(ClientRequest clientRequest) throws SendingDataException
      Method to handle requests from client

      It check what type of requests is received and then generate and rend answer to client

      Parameters:
      clientRequest - Request from client
      Throws:
      IOException - If any I\O error occurred while sending answer to client
      SendingDataException

    • readFileName

      private static String readFileName()
      Method to read name of environmental variable from console

      If variable if is not valid it prints an error message and stops program

      Returns:
      String path to data file

    • loadData

      private static PriorityQueue<Worker> loadData()
      Method to load collection from data file.

      Method also completes validation of filePath and collection inside dataFile

      Returns:
      Collection of workers
      See Also:
      • DataFileController
      • CollectionController
